allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign skill tree layout from horizontal to vertical with connectors

Change skill tree display from left-to-right columns to top-to-bottom rows
with SVG bezier curves showing skill dependencies. Level 1 skills now appear
at the top, progressing down to level 7 at the bottom.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 7 unique boss archetypes with distinct mechanics

Implement boss system with level-specific encounters:
- Molly the Matron \(Swarm Master\): spawns minions, heals allies
- Iron Knuckles McGee \(Executioner\): high burst damage, marks targets
- Blast Barrel Betty \(Devastator\): AoE damage specialist
- Pickled Pete \(Tank Buster\): piercing damage, destroys shields
- The Jukebox Jinx \(Tempo Manipulator\): AP drain and manipulation
- Old Nan the Nightmare \(Regenerator\): life drain, constant healing
- The Last Call \(Hybrid Nightmare\): combines all mechanics

Added spawnMinion and removeShield effect types, drain healing,
and level-based fight creation functions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
